product_name: Case Cutlery ARL Dark Oak Stockman Knife
long_description: This ARL Dark Oak Stockman Knife features a surgical-steel clip blade, a spey blade and a sheepsfoot blade housed in a beautiful reclaimed-wood handle for a lifetime of use in the outdoors.
short_description: This ARL Dark Oak Stockman Knife features a surgical-steel clip blade, a spey blade and a sheepsfoot blade housed in a beautiful reclaimed-wood handle for a lifetime of use in the outdoors.
